title: Vice President - RTA Operations
description: Lead and oversee all aspects of Registrar and Transfer Agent operations, including shareholder services, corporate actions, and regulatory compliance. Drive strategic initiatives to enhance operational efficiency and client satisfaction.

title: Assistant Vice President - Compliance
description: Manage regulatory compliance programs, oversee audit processes, and ensure adherence to SEBI regulations. Develop and implement compliance policies and procedures for RTA operations.

title: Senior Manager - Corporate Actions
description: Handle complex corporate actions including dividends, bonuses, splits, and rights issues. Coordinate with clients and regulatory bodies to ensure smooth execution of corporate events.

title: Manager - IT Infrastructure
description: Manage and enhance IT infrastructure supporting RTA operations. Implement security measures and ensure system availability for critical shareholder services.

title: Manager - Investor Relations
description: Handle investor queries, manage shareholder communications, and ensure high-quality service delivery. Coordinate with internal teams to resolve complex shareholder issues.

title: Associate - Share Transfer Processing
description: Process share transfer requests, handle transmission cases, and maintain shareholder records. Ensure accuracy and compliance in all transfer-related activities.
